attributes.action: Justice for ex service men and women our heros old and new before refugees
attributes.additional_details: Ex service men and women living rough on the streets no home no food no chance of employment begging for change .once proud soldiers ready to defend our rights.so ask yourselfs is it ok we put refugees from other countries in houses with all benefits but cant help our brave lets stand united and get our ex servicemen homes and help they need.get our ex servicemen off the streets...
attributes.background: It about time this country stopped forgetting about our ex service men and women old and new who have lost everything living on the streets or struggling to live day to day .forgotten about because they can no longer serve they risked there lives so you see another day lets really help our heros..
